verses.text: \w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G4845"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Pentecost|strong="G4005"\w* was fully \w come|strong="G4845"\w*, \w they|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* with one \w accord|strong="G3661"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* one \w place|strong="G1909"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w suddenly|strong="G0869"\w* there \w came|strong="G1096"\w* a \w sound|strong="G2279"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w as|strong="G5618"\w* of a \w rushing|strong="G5342"\w* \w mighty|strong="G0972"\w* \w wind|strong="G4157"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* it \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* they \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* there \w appeared|strong="G3700"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w cloven|strong="G1266"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* like \w as|strong="G5616"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* it \w sat|strong="G2523"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w each|strong="G1538"\w* of \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* they \w were|strong="G4130"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* with \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w began|strong="G0756"\w* to speak \w with|strong="G2980"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w gave|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w utterance|strong="G0669"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* there \w were|strong="G2258"\w* \w dwelling|strong="G2730"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w*, \w devout|strong="G2126"\w* \w men|strong="G0435"\w*, out \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w when|strong="G1096"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w was|strong="G1096"\w* noised \w abroad|strong="G5456"\w*, the \w multitude|strong="G4128"\w* came \w together|strong="G4905"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w confounded|strong="G4797"\w*, because \w that|strong="G3754"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* in his \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w language|strong="G1258"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w were|strong="G1839"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w amazed|strong="G1839"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w marvelled|strong="G2296"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w Behold|strong="G2400"\w*, \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* which \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w Galilæans|strong="G1057"\w*?

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w how|strong="G4459"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* every \w man|strong="G1538"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1258"\w*, \w wherein|strong="G3739"\w* we were \w born|strong="G1080"\w*?

\w Parthians|strong="G3934"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Medes|strong="G3370"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elamites|strong="G1639"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w dwellers|strong="G2730"\w* in \w Mesopotamia|strong="G3318"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* in \w Judæa|strong="G2449"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cappadocia|strong="G2587"\w*, in \w Pontus|strong="G4195"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Asia|strong="G0773"\w*,

\w Phrygia|strong="G5435"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pamphylia|strong="G3828"\w*, in \w Egypt|strong="G0125"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in the \w parts|strong="G3313"\w* of \w Libya|strong="G3033"\w* \w about|strong="G2596"\w* \w Cyrene|strong="G2957"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strangers|strong="G1927"\w* of \w Rome|strong="G4514"\w*, \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w proselytes|strong="G4339"\w*,

\w Cretes|strong="G2912"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Arabians|strong="G0690"\w*, we do \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* in \w our|strong="G2251"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* the wonderful \w works|strong="G3167"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G1161"\w* they \w were|strong="G1839"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w amazed|strong="G1839"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were in \w doubt|strong="G1280"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w* \w one|strong="G0243"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0243"\w*, \w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w meaneth|strong="G2309"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*?
\w Others|strong="G2087"\w* \w mocking|strong="G5512"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, These \w men|strong="G3325"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w full|strong="G3325"\w* of new \w wine|strong="G1098"\w*.

¶ \w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w*, standing \w up|strong="G2476"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w eleven|strong="G1733"\w*, lifted \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w said|strong="G0669"\w* unto \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, Ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Judæa|strong="G2453"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \add ye\add* that \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* at \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w be|strong="G2077"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hearken \w to|strong="G1801"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w*:

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G3184"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w drunken|strong="G3184"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w suppose|strong="G5274"\w*, seeing it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \add but\add* \w the|strong="G5610"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* of the \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* which was \w spoken|strong="G2046"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Joel|strong="G2493"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it shall come to \w pass|strong="G2071"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, I will pour \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w* shall \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* young \w men|strong="G3495"\w* shall \w see|strong="G3700"\w* \w visions|strong="G3706"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* old \w men|strong="G4245"\w* shall \w dream|strong="G1797"\w* \w dreams|strong="G1798"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w handmaidens|strong="G1399"\w* I will pour \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G1565"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they shall \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w shew|strong="G1325"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w beneath|strong="G2736"\w*; \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w vapour|strong="G0822"\w* of \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w*:

The \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* shall be \w turned|strong="G3344"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w moon|strong="G4582"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, before \w that|strong="G4250"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w notable|strong="G2016"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w come|strong="G2064"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* it shall come to \w pass|strong="G2071"\w*, \add that\add* \w whosoever|strong="G0302"\w* shall call \w on|strong="G1941"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* shall be \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.

Ye \w men|strong="G0435"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w*, \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \w these|strong="G5128"\w* \w words|strong="G3056"\w*; \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* of \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w*, a \w man|strong="G0435"\w* \w approved|strong="G0584"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w among|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w by|strong="G0584"\w* \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* ye \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*:

\w Him|strong="G5126"\w*, being \w delivered|strong="G1560"\w* by \w the|strong="G1012"\w* \w determinate|strong="G3724"\w* \w counsel|strong="G1012"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w foreknowledge|strong="G4268"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, ye have \w taken|strong="G2983"\w*, and \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w wicked|strong="G0459"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* have \w crucified|strong="G4362"\w* and \w slain|strong="G0337"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath raised \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, having \w loosed|strong="G3089"\w* the \w pains|strong="G5604"\w* of \w death|strong="G2288"\w*: \w because|strong="G2530"\w* it \w was|strong="G2258"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w possible|strong="G1415"\w* \w that|strong="G2902"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* should be \w holden|strong="G2902"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w speaketh|strong="G3004"\w* \w concerning|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, I \w foresaw|strong="G4308"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* my \w face|strong="G3450"\w*, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* I \w should|strong="G4531"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* be \w moved|strong="G4531"\w*:

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w did|strong="G2165"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G2165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* was \w glad|strong="G0021"\w*; \w moreover|strong="G2089"\w* \w also|strong="G1161"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* shall \w rest|strong="G2681"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*:

\w Because|strong="G3754"\w* thou \w wilt|strong="G1459"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w leave|strong="G1459"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w hell|strong="G0086"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* wilt thou \w suffer|strong="G1325"\w* \w thine|strong="G4675"\w* Holy \w One|strong="G3741"\w* to \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w corruption|strong="G1312"\w*.

Thou hast made \w known|strong="G1107"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w* the \w ways|strong="G3598"\w* of \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; thou shalt \w make|strong="G4137"\w* \w me|strong="G3165"\w* \w full|strong="G4137"\w* of \w joy|strong="G2167"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w countenance|strong="G4383"\w*.

\w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w let|strong="G1832"\w* \w me|strong="G2036"\w* \w freely|strong="G3954"\w* \w speak|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w patriarch|strong="G3966"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he \w is|strong="G5053"\w* \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w dead|strong="G5053"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w buried|strong="G2290"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sepulchre|strong="G3418"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w unto|strong="G0891"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w being|strong="G5225"\w* a \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* had \w sworn|strong="G3660"\w* with an \w oath|strong="G3727"\w* to \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3660"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w loins|strong="G3751"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, he would raise \w up|strong="G0450"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* to \w sit|strong="G2523"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*;

He seeing \w this|strong="G4275"\w* before \w spake|strong="G2980"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* the \w resurrection|strong="G0386"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w was|strong="G2641"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w left|strong="G2641"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w hell|strong="G0086"\w*, \w neither|strong="G3761"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* did \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w corruption|strong="G1312"\w*.

\w This|strong="G5126"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w hath|strong="G0450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* raised \w up|strong="G0450"\w*, \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G2070"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w being|strong="G5312"\w* by the right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w exalted|strong="G5312"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* having \w received|strong="G2983"\w* \w of|strong="G3844"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* of \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*, he hath shed \w forth|strong="G1632"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w see|strong="G0991"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w is|strong="G0305"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w ascended|strong="G0305"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w*: \w but|strong="G1161"\w* he \w saith|strong="G3004"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="G3588"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G2962"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, Sit \w thou|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1537"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* right \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*,
\w Until|strong="G2193"\w* I \w make|strong="G5087"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w foes|strong="G2190"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w footstool|strong="G5286"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w let|strong="G1097"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w house|strong="G3624"\w* of \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w know|strong="G1097"\w* \w assuredly|strong="G0806"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* hath \w made|strong="G4160"\w* \w that|strong="G5126"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w ye|strong="G5210"\w* have \w crucified|strong="G4717"\w*, \w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

¶ Now \w when|strong="G1161"\w* they \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add this\add*, they were \w pricked|strong="G2660"\w* in their \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G5037"\w* \w said|strong="G2036"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to the \w rest|strong="G3062"\w* of the \w apostles|strong="G0652"\w*, \w Men|strong="G0435"\w* \add and\add* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w what|strong="G5101"\w* shall we \w do|strong="G4160"\w*?

\w Then|strong="G1161"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w said|strong="G5346"\w* \w unto|strong="G4314"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w*, \w Repent|strong="G3340"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* be \w baptized|strong="G0907"\w* every \w one|strong="G1538"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* the \w name|strong="G3686"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w remission|strong="G0859"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* ye shall \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* the \w gift|strong="G1431"\w* of \w the|strong="G4151"\w* \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w Ghost|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* the \w promise|strong="G1860"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G5043"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w that|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1519"\w* afar \w off|strong="G3112"\w*, \add even\add* as many \w as|strong="G3745"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* shall \w call|strong="G4341"\w*.
